Title: Wana: Hakudaku Mamire no Houkago
Description: ["Raika's brother died suddenly. She changed to her brother's school (all-boy school), so she could to find why he committed suicide. Someone interferes with her and discovers her identity leading closer to the truth behind her brother's death. ", '\n', '\n']
